comment: Had him for Statics.  He does great lectures and is easy to understand.  He is a cool teacher and will make a joke or two a class but does also eat up time talking about his son.  He knows what he is doing cause he actually worked on bridges before teaching.  Highly suggest him because I actually remember the stuff he taught a year after.

Currin likes Currin. Currin thinks he's the best and the smartest guy. His stories time of Currin is boring, pointless and wasting time of others. Who cares about your life? We're just trying to learn from your class.

This guy is really rude when you come to his office for questions. He's not trying to help students at all and very disrespecting to others. His teaching style is NOT understandable. Stay away from this guy. I hope he'll retire soon.
This Prof. Knows a lot. However his ego is too big. If you attent class and pay attention you can pass. If not too bad he is the only one that teaches this class
